description: 3 sets of English vocabulary words with corresponding Cantonese word, English sentence, Cantonese sentence, and image file names

lessonWords.englishSentence: I am happy to see you.
I am angry that you stepped on my favourite potato chips.
lessonWords.cantoneseSentence: 我很嬲因為你踩到我最喜歡的薯片。

lessonWords.englishSentence: I am tired from a productive day of eating snacks.
lessonWords.cantoneseSentence: 吃零食的一天讓我很累。

lessonWords.englishSentence: The Cookie Monster makes me scared.
I am confused why this cake looks so much like me.
lessonWords.cantoneseSentence: 我很迷茫為什麼這個蛋糕看起來很像我。

lessonWords.englishSentence: I am energetic whenever I see a table full of food!
lessonWords.cantoneseSentence: 每當我看到裝滿食物的桌子時，我就會充滿活力！

lessonWords.englishSentence: I am jealous that your lunch is bigger than mine.
lessonWords.cantoneseSentence: 我很妒忌你的午餐比我的大。

lessonWords.englishSentence: I am shocked by how delicious this pizza tastes!
lessonWords.cantoneseSentence: 這個比薩餅的味道真美味，我感到震驚！

lessonWords.englishSentence: I am annoyed that these candies aren't on sale today.
lessonWords.cantoneseSentence: 我很忟這些糖果今天不銷售。

lessonWords.englishSentence: I am bored because my brother hid all my snacks away.
lessonWords.cantoneseSentence: 我很悶因為我的兄弟把我所有的小吃都藏起來了。

set2.englishSentence: I am happy to see you
I am happy to see you

set3.englishSentence: I am happy to see you
I am happy to see you
